main_menu.mnuIncBinInQSearch: Include Notes From Recycle Bin in "Quick Search"

note_menu.mnuReplacePost: Replace Note Text By Post From:

controls.chkNoSplash: Do not show splash screen on program start
controls.chkShowCPOnStart: Show Control Panel on program start
controls.chkCheckNewVersionOnStart: Check for new version on program start
controls.chkCheckCriticalOnStart: Check for critical updates on program start
controls.chkCheckCriticalPeriodically: Check for critical updates during program's work
controls.chkChangeHideToDelete: Change appearance of "Hide" button to "Delete" button
controls.lblParIndent: Step of paragraph indent's increasing/decreasing (in twips)
controls.lblMargins: Left and right margin width - for skinless notes
controls.chkSaveWithoutConfirm: Save notes without confirmation while hiding
controls.chkWarnBeforeEmptyBin: Warn when note is deleted automatically from Recycle Bin
controls.chkDeleteShortExit: Delete desktop shortcuts on program exit
controls.chkRestoreShortStart: Restore desktop shortcuts on program start
controls.chkCloseOnShortcut: Close note after desktop shortcut creation
controls.lblDeleBin: Delete note from Recycle Bin after selected period (days)
controls.chkRoll: Roll/unroll note by double click on caption
controls.chkShowPriority: Always show notes marked as "High Priority" on program start
controls.chkAutoHeight: Automatically adjust note's height depending on its content
controls.chkAutomaticSmilies: Automatically insert smilies while typing ':)' or ':('
controls.lblParagraphSpace: Distance used for adding space before/after paragraph (in points)
controls.lblFontSample: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
controls.chkAddWeekdayName: Add weekday name to note's name
controls.chkWeekdayAtTheEnd: Add weekday name at the end of note's name
controls.chkNoPreviousDiary: Do not show diary "pages" from previous dates in "Diary" menu
controls.chkDiaryAscOrder: Ascending sort of "pages" in "Diary" menu (starting from earliest)
controls.lblNumberOfDiaries: Number of diary "pages" shown in "Diary" menu
controls.lblDiaryNaming: Date format used for naming of notes that belong to "Diary" group
controls.chkCenterScreen: Move notes to the center of screen
controls.chkShowSeparateNotes: Show separate notes under each group in Show/Hide menus
controls.chkShowBigIcons: Show big icons on PNotes.NET Control Panel's toolbar
controls.chkDontShowList: Do not show notes in the list of opened windows (Alt+Tab) ( * )
controls.chkHideMainWindow: Do not show main (invisible) program window in the list of opened windows (Alt+Tab) ( *** )
controls.chkKeepVisibleOnShowdesktop: Keep notes visible while hovering over "Show Desktop" button ( ** )
controls.chkPreventResizing: Prevent notes from being automatically arranged when moved to the edge of the screen ( ** )
controls.lblDblAction: Action after double click on system tray icon
controls.lblSingleAction: Action after single click on system tray icon
controls.lblDefName: Use following as default name of new note
controls.lblLengthOfName: Length of note's text used as default name for new note
controls.lblLengthOfContent: Length of note's text shown in "Content" column at Control Panel
controls.lblTransWarning: Value of 100% will result in fully transparent window!
controls.lblPanelRemove: Action to remove note from panel
controls.tbPanelDelay: Delay of automatic panel appearance (in seconds)
controls.chkHideTrayIcon: Hide icon from system tray if program is locked
controls.lblBackupDeepness: Backup deepness (amount of copies for each note)
controls.chkDonotShowProtected: Do not show note's content at Control Panel if note or its group is password protected
controls.chkIncludeBinInLocalSync: Include notes from Recycle Bin in local synchronization
controls.lblLocalSyncCompList: Automatically synchronize with following computers when started from USB drive
controls.chkPromptForPassword: Prompt for password on attempts to save as text file/copy text from/send password protected note
controls.chkLocalAutoRestart: If restart is required after background synchronization, do it automatically
controls.chkIncludeBinInSync: Include notes from Recycle Bin in synchronization
controls.chkAllowPing: Allow checking of connection with recipient's computer (ping)
controls.chkNoNotifyOnArrive: Do not show notification when new note arrives
controls.chkShowRecOnClick: Show received note after click on notification message
controls.chkShowIncomingOnClick: Show "Incoming" group after click on notification message
controls.chkNoSoundOnArrive: Do not play sound when new note arrives
controls.chkNoNotifyOnSend: Do not show notification when note is sending
controls.chkNoContInContextMenu: Do not show contacts in context menu
controls.tbSendTimeout: Max timeout for sending note and processing it on recipient's side (seconds)
controls.lblSmtp: Select profile for sending mails instead of standard e-mail program
controls.chkAutoRestart: If restart is required after background synchronization, do it automatically
controls.lblDeleteContactsGroup: Delete selected group of contacts and:
controls.lblSPWarning: Please, check the query line of search provider in browser before adding. It may looks like "http://www.google.com/search?q="
controls.lblEnterHK: Type the keys to be used as hot keys for selected command
controls.lblHelpMissing: Local help file is missing. Please, choose one of the options below:
controls.optGetCHM: Download help file in CHM format
controls.optGetPDF: Download help file in PDF format
controls.cmdShowAllFromGroup: Show all notes from selected group
controls.cmdHideAllFromGroup: Hide all notes from selected group
controls.chkTrak: Do not track the overdue note
controls.lblMonthExactWarning: If there is no such date in current month, the nearest date will be used instead.
controls.chkNoRecycle: Do not import notes from Recycle Bin
controls.chkImportGroups: Import groups (groups hierarchy would not be preserved)
controls.chkKeepInvisible: Keep notes invisible (check if you import a large amount of notes)
controls.lblImportSettingsWarning: ATTENTION! Import selected settings will override existing ones.
controls.chkDontShowMessage: Do not show this message again
controls.lblWarn1: ( * ) - New value will be used in newly created notes only

messages.def_warning: You are about to reset ALL program settings to their default values. Continue?
messages.sound_exists: The file already exists in your 'sounds' directory. Copy anyway?
messages.sync_comp_exists: Local synchronization target with this name already exists
messages.pwrd_not_identical: Both password strings should be identical. Please, check the spelling.
messages.group_exists: Contacts group with this name already exists
messages.contact_exists: Contact with this name already exists
messages.ext_exists: External program with this name already exists
messages.sp_exists: Search provider with this name already exists
messages.new_version_1: New version of PNotes.NET is available - %PLACEHOLDER1%.
messages.new_version_2: Click 'OK' in order to install new version (restart of program is required).
messages.new_version_3: Click here in order to install new version (restart of program is required).
messages.new_version_plugins: New versions of following plugins are available:
messages.latest_version: You are using the latest version of PNotes.NET.
messages.first_baloon_message: Right click on system tray icon to begin the work.
messages.license: This program is distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 or later.
messages.thanks: Thanks to all over the world who tests, translates and simply uses the program.
messages.code_thanks: Special thanks for very helpful code snippets and examples to:
messages.sug_thanks: Thanks for suggestions and selfless testing to:
messages.hk_registered_1: This combination of keys is already registered.
messages.hk_exists: The same combination of keys already exists
messages.delete_to_bin: Do you want to send this note to Recycle Bin?
messages.delete_completely: Do you want to completely delete this note?
messages.delete_to_bin_many: Do you want to send these %PLACEHOLDER1% notes to Recycle Bin?
messages.delete_completely_many: Do you want to completely delete these %PLACEHOLDER1% notes?
messages.delete_group_warning: Are you sure you want to delete this group - %PLACEHOLDER1% - and all included subgroups and notes?
messages.save_note_2: Do you want to save it?
messages.id_exists: The note with the same ID already exists.
messages.replace_hidden_2: All matched entries in hidden notes will be replaced and saved. Continue?
messages.no_backup_copies: There are no backup copies for current note
messages.restore_question: Do you want to restore the note's content from selected backup copy?
messages.empty_bin_warning: Emptying of Recycle Bin cannot be rolled back. Continue?
messages.selection_objects_warning: Selected text contains one or more non-text objects (pictures etc). If you continue, these objects will be deleted. Continue anyway?
messages.many_files_dropped: Only one file may be dropped onto note
messages.full_restore_complete: Restoration from full backup copy completed successfully.
messages.full_restore_warning: ATTENTION! All existing notes will be removed and replaced by notes from backup copy. Continue?
messages.sync_complete_reload: Synchronization completed successfully. The program has to be restarted for applying all changes.
messages.diff_versions: Current version of database is different from previously synchronized version. Synchronization cannot be performed.
messages.outlook_not_running: MS Outlook application is not running. Please, start the application and try again.
messages.load_autosaved: Program did not finish correctly last time. Would you like to load auto-saved notes?
messages.clean_bin_1: The following notes will be permanently deleted from Recycle Bin:
messages.clean_bin_2: Choose "Yes" to continue or "No" to postpone the deletion to a future time.
messages.hide_on_lock_warning: In order to allow the tray icon to be hidden when program is locked you have to set a hot key for "Lock Program" menu item
messages.confirm_plugin_remove: Do you really want to remove selected plugin?
messages.confirm_plugin_remove_1: Plugin removal requires program restart. Do you want to restart the program now?
messages.confirm_plugin_remove_2: Yes - to restart now, No - to restart later, Cancel - to cancel removal
messages.confirm_restart_1: In order for the new settings to take effect you have to restart the program.
messages.confirm_restart_2: Press 'Yes' to restart it now, or 'No' to restart later.
messages.dicts_found: Applying new dictionaries requires program restart. Do you want to restart now?
messages.sync_error_2: Please, refer to log file of appropriate plugin.
messages.send_error_1: An error occurred during note(s) sending.
messages.send_error_2: Please, refer to log file for details.
messages.smtp_same_address: There is already SMTP profile with the same address
messages.mail_contact_same_address: There is already mail contact with the same name and address
messages.critical_applied: The program has restarted for applying critical updates.
messages.new_edition: You have started the new edition of PNotes.NET. All your settings from previous edition have been saved as ZIP archive at
messages.same_actions: You can not choose the same action for double click and single click
messages.image_size_message: The size of image has to be 16x16
messages.completed_hidden: In order to show notes marked as "Completed" uncheck appropriate check box at "Behavior" page of Preferences dialog
messages.back_prev: Backing up files from previous edition...
messages.host_unknown: Computer %PLACEHOLDER1% cannot be found on network
messages.contact_disconnected: Computer of contact %PLACEHOLDER1% is not connected to network
messages.address_not_found: One or more of specified IP addresses cannot be found
messages.contacts_disconnected: Computers of one or more contacts are not connected to network
messages.hosts_unknown: One or more computers cannot be found on network
messages.inv_file_link: Invalid link to file system object
messages.sec_ex_link: You have no permissions to work with file
messages.file_not_exist: The link is pointing to not existing file (directory)
messages.dict_connection_problem: The dictionaries download server is unavailable. Open dictionaries page in browser?
messages.link_not_exists: The linked note does not exist. Perhaps it has been moved to Recycle Bin or deleted completely.
messages.export_in_progress: Export notes is in progress. The destination file is:
messages.invalid_start_date: Starting date should not be more than ending date
messages.invalid_exp_comm_line: Invalid file specified for notes report
messages.report_lib_missing: Export to PDF, DOC or TIF requires downloading of additional libraries. Continue?
messages.no_server_props: You must specify server IP address and port
messages.encrypt_warning_1: You are about to load notes into the program which is using encryption.
messages.encrypt_warning_2: If these notes have been encrypted before, it may cause them to become unreadable. Continue?
messages.invalid_file_format: Invalid file format. Perhaps it has been encrypted before.

time_format_chars_h12.h: Hours with no leading zero for single-digit hours; 12-hour clock.
time_format_chars_h12.hh: Hours with leading zero for single-digit hours; 12-hour clock.

time_format_chars_h24.H: Hours with no leading zero for single-digit hours; 24-hour clock.
time_format_chars_h24.HH: Hours with leading zero for single-digit hours; 24-hour clock.

time_format_chars.m: Minutes with no leading zero for single-digit minutes.
time_format_chars.mm: Minutes with leading zero for single-digit minutes.
time_format_chars.s: Seconds with no leading zero for single-digit seconds.
time_format_chars.ss: Seconds with leading zero for single-digit seconds.
time_format_chars.t: One character time-marker string, such as A or P.
time_format_chars.tt: Multi-character time-marker string, such as AM or PM.

date_format_chars.d: Day of month as digits with no leading zero for single-digit days.
date_format_chars.dd: Day of month as digits with leading zero for single-digit days.
date_format_chars.ddd: Day of week as a three-letter abbreviation.
date_format_chars.dddd: Day of week as its full name.
date_format_chars.M: Month as digits with no leading zero for single-digit months.
date_format_chars.MM: Month as digits with leading zero for single-digit months.
date_format_chars.y: Year as last two digits, but with no leading zero for years less than 10.
date_format_chars.yy: Year as last two digits, but with leading zero for years less than 10.
date_format_chars.yyyy: Year represented by full four digits.

captions.sent_to_server: Following notes have been sent to server due to unreachable recipients
captions.import_warning_2: 1. Decrypt all encrypted notes in old version of PNotes
captions.import_warning_3: 2. Remove password protection from all protected notes in old version of PNotes
captions.scramble_warning: Encryption of note's text will remove all rich text formatting!

misc.tray_tooltip: PNotes.NET - your virtual desktop notes organizer
misc.orient_top: Put panel along the top edge
misc.orient_left: Put panel along the left edge

list_cboDefName._2: Current date/time and first characters of note

list_cboSearchСriteria._1: Match every word in search string
list_cboSearchСriteria._2: Match at least one word in search string

report_parameters.Title: PNotes.NET notes report
report_parameters.filter_creation: Creation date of notes between %PLACEHOLDER1% and %PLACEHOLDER2%
report_parameters.filter_saving: Saving date of notes between %PLACEHOLDER1% and %PLACEHOLDER2%
